name: Exile's Circlet
title: Noble Descent: Exile's Circlet
desc: "Woe to thee, oh great hall with silver piled high! Why is your crown drenched in blood?"
in_play_description: After the character uses an Elemental Burst: All your characters on standby gain 1 Energy. (Once per Round)

After the character uses an Elemental Burst: All your characters on standby gain 1 Energy. (Once per Round)
